alert.note: Alert for Robeson (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wilmington (Northeastern South Carolina and Southeastern North Carolina - Wilmington)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 19 at 10:40PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northern Robeson County through 1130 PM EDT... At 1040 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Maxton, or near Laurinburg, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Red Springs, Maxton, St. Pauls, Buie, Wakulla, Rex, Tolarsville, Prospect, Shannon, Parkton, Rennert and Lumber Bridge. This includes Interstate 95 in North Carolina between mile markers 26 and 38. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
